DEBUG.description: Setting log levels. If on, logging.debug and logging.info is logged to APP_LOG_FILE_LOCATION etc.

CLEANUP.description: If true, after file creation, delete (for .lcf/.gsm creation used) temproary folders.

WMCC_PATH.description: Absolute path to python folder. Maybe a system variable.

ARCHICAD_LOCATION.description: Relative path to ARCHICAD executables under WMCC_PATH

TARGET_GDL_DIR_NAME.description: Relative path to macrosets and placeablesets under WMCC_PATH. Macrosets are stored permanently (uploaded to every brand's product page), while placeablesets (placeables' lcfs) are deleted after product page upload. This is currently under Python source folder.

ADDITIONAL_IMAGE_DIR_NAME.description: Relative path to icon images for stuff, stored in SVN repo.

APP_LOG_FILE_LOCATION.description: Log file location of python script, can be in a temporary storage.

LOGLEVEL.description: Log level for WMCC.py and application.py, integer or can be a string
